previewArticle.title: Ukraine vs. USMNT | International Friendly Preview

recapArticle.title: Ukraine 2, USMNT 0 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Dangerous play by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).
Viacheslav Shevchuk (Ukraine) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, USA. Geoff Cameron tries a through ball, but Jozy Altidore is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Wyatt Hunter
timelineItems.text: This US-Ukraine game is a bit eerie with so few people there. Important game for both teams but for very different reasons. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Madison DeCerce
timelineItems.text: So, there's gotta be less than 200 people at the #USMNT match in Cyprus. Gotta feel for the Ukraine.

timelineItems.name: Austin J. Hunt
timelineItems.text: "Probably less than 1000 Ukrainian fans in the stands tonight," says @BobLeyESPN. #USAvsUKR http://t.co/bLpKqvzpQ6

timelineItems.name: Austin J. Hunt
timelineItems.text: "Probably less than 1000 Ukrainian fans in the stands tonight," says @BobLeyESPN. #USAvsUKR http://t.co/bLpKqvzpQ6

timelineItems.name: Graham Ruthven
timelineItems.text: Ukrainian team linked for the national anthem. Chants of 'We are Ukraine' break out in stands. #USMNT http://t.co/Qyid7sXu8V

timelineItems.name: Graham Ruthven
timelineItems.text: Ukrainian team linked for the national anthem. Chants of 'We are Ukraine' break out in stands. #USMNT http://t.co/Qyid7sXu8V

timelineItems.name: Carrie Dew
timelineItems.text: The beautiful thing about soccer is that when the whistle blows, nothing else matters for 90 minutes. #USAvsUKR #Ukraine

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: I feel like this is a Chivas USA match. #UKRvUSA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Patriot Brigade
timelineItems.text: Awesome to see @J_Klinsmann shaking the Ukrainian teams hands... Great show of sportsmanship #USMNT #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: And we're off! #USAvUKR 1'

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: And so the "top-buttoners" emerge. #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.name: Kenny Delgado
timelineItems.text: So far Castillo has been not in the right place or getting beat #USAvUKR not a good impression so far

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Denis Garmash (Ukraine) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Yevhen Konoplyanka with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Matt Rohlf
timelineItems.text: oh. that's not supposed to happen #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Francis Rivera
timelineItems.text: 1. EPIC initial save Timmy. 2. Boooooooo. #usavukr

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOL! (12') | Yarmolenko anota el primer gol del partido luego de una falta de comunicación en el fondo estadounidense. #UKRvUSA 1-0

timelineItems.name: Ken LaVicka
timelineItems.text: Yep, predictably awful on the back line. Embarrassing. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pecoraro
timelineItems.text: One day Howard's either going to retire or he's going to kill a #usmnt defender. That was awful

timelineItems.comment: Yevhen Khacheridi (Ukraine) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sacha Kljestan (USA).
Corner,  Ukraine. Conceded by Fabian Johnson.
Offside, Ukraine. Denis Garmash tries a through ball, but Olexandr Kucher is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ephraim Alajaji
timelineItems.text: Shaky would be a compliment to this back line right now #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Jared Cantrell
timelineItems.text: To be fair, the US attack hasn't been very impressive either. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Boney Starks!
timelineItems.text: One cool thing about the crown being so sparse, you can hear all of the communication going on from Tim Howard to his line. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Fuera de lugar (16') | Ucrania tuvo el segundo, pero el asistente levanta bandera. Parecía habilitado. #UKRvUSA 1-0 http://t.co/lYPgGzowKp

timelineItems.name: Steve Davis
timelineItems.text: 15 mins into #USMNT match ... Sacha Kljestan ... that impact thing ... Waiting .... Waiting ....

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ukraine. Artem Fedetskiy tries a through ball, but Denis Garmash is caught offside.
Foul by Roman Zozulya (Ukraine).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Robinson
timelineItems.text: Not sure who's idea this #USMNT backline was, but it was a terrible one

timelineItems.comment: Offside, USA. John Anthony Brooks tries a through ball, but Jozy Altidore is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jared Dostal
timelineItems.text: It's friendly until you get scored on #USAvsUKR game on

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Geoff Cameron.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Chupka
timelineItems.text: #USMNT thoughts - love the new kits even if I keep thinking we're england — and the lack of a real crowd is very odd

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).
Ruslan Rotan (Ukraine) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Who would've thought a couple of years ago that if you subtracted MLS players from the #USMNT pre-World Cup, the team would look so abysmal.

timelineItems.name: Lisa Jelinek
timelineItems.text: USA looking lazy. Sloppy passing, no communication... the defense is still in Frankfurt, apparently. Should be more than 1-0. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Ukraine 2, USA 0.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Jared Sean
timelineItems.text: Jozy looks inspired #USMNT , by inspired I mean he is constantly off side and losing the ball more than he is keeping it

timelineItems.name: Harsh V Singh
timelineItems.text: *Sees #USMNT score* *sees who's playing defense for them* *understands why they're losing 1-0*

timelineItems.name: Stuart Willings
timelineItems.text: US being outplayed. Altidore looking like a player that doesn't get any playing time. He isn't the confident player he was with AZ. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Ki Thornberry
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT is playing about as good as those new kits look. #terrible #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Taylorgasm
timelineItems.text: I'm not going to say that we're purposefully throwing this friendly, but we're purposefully throwing this friendly #USMNT #USA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ruslan Rotan (Ukraine).
Fabian Johnson (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Chadd Sult
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones looks awful out there... About 2 steps slow. #USAvsUKR

timelineItems.name: Footie
timelineItems.text: Unlike jan camp squad this squad playing a World Cup caliber opponent . Like Sweden Ukraine just missed out. Good test. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: BJ Neilsen
timelineItems.text: I really love Kljestan but he looks completely lost #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.comment: Sacha Kljestan (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Denis Garmash (Ukraine).

timelineItems.name: Grant Wahl
timelineItems.text: Still think Geoff Cameron's best US position is central midfield next to Michael Bradley.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Even regulars such as Jones and Dempsey look like they’re on different pages. Nothing coherent at all on the pitch. #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Andriy Yarmolenko (Ukraine) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Édgar Castillo (USA).

timelineItems.name: Kevin
timelineItems.text: Clint Dempsey turnover machine. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Cornelius Rosan
timelineItems.text: Cue #USMNT fan overreaction.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: (27') | Primera llegada con peligro de EE.UU. Buena combinación por la derecha, con centro de Cameron: http://t.co/syipk1qAU1 #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.name: Joel Jackson
timelineItems.text: Hey #USMNT , the match has started in case you weren't aware

timelineItems.name: Steve Davis
timelineItems.text: Gonna say this now, because it HAS to be said every such instance: #USMNT w/out its midfield brain (Bradley) is a struggle waiting to happen

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tobias
timelineItems.text: I am watching the soccer match. The #USMNT should not also be watching the soccer match. @AlexiLalas @LeanderOnFOX @Jimnicki @ussoccer

timelineItems.name: Tyler Franz
timelineItems.text: The only thing more annoying than 50.000 vuvuzelas is 2 air horns #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Andrew Joseph
timelineItems.text: On TV the #USMNT kits look pretty good. Kinda like Real Madrid.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Andriy Yarmolenko (Ukraine) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Artem Fedetskiy with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Liza Konovalova
timelineItems.text: I just love #Yarmolenko. He is great. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Brad Mitchell
timelineItems.text: I think we can officially declare this Edgar Castillo thing dead. #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Craig Crafton
timelineItems.text: Howard is still a badass though #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Not sure this is the sort of Clint Dempsey display Seattle fans wanted to see ahead of the opener this weekend. #mls #usmnt #Sounders

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ukraine. Denis Garmash tries a through ball, but Roman Zozulya is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Nate Scott
timelineItems.text: Geoff Cameron's crosses make me sad. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.comment: Édgar Castillo (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ruslan Rotan (Ukraine).

timelineItems.name: Warren Ables
timelineItems.text: When your LB reminds you of Jonathan Bornstein, that's NOT a good thing. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Tom Reinstadtler
timelineItems.text: Yarmolenko is single handedly making this US squad look like a bunch of assholes #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ruslan Rotan (Ukraine).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Rooney
timelineItems.text: The entire #USMNT defense is playing themselves off the World Cup roster

timelineItems.name: Josh Elliott
timelineItems.text: Ukraine should be up...what, 3-0? I realize this isn't the #usmnt at full strength, but....

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Artem Fedetskiy (Ukraine).
Jozy Altidore (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: Looks like I'm missing a tremendous #USMNT performance. In fairness, I'm sure the #Ukraine are pretty fired up right now. #AO

Corner,  USA. Conceded by Artem Fedetskiy.

timelineItems.name: Joel Hoover
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT jerseys are even worse now with those letters and numbers. They look EXACTLY like an England kit…no originality.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jozy Altidore (USA) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Geoff Cameron with a cross.
Attempt missed. Alejandro Bedoya (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
Delay in match Jermaine Jones (USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Denis Garmash (Ukraine).

timelineItems.name: Sam Siemers
timelineItems.text: Two minutes in and I'm already sick of the dude with the air horn! Please stop.... #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: CD
timelineItems.text: "Those commie reds can take our freedom, but they can't take away our footy!" -- Ukraine Soccer Federation #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: Yarmolenko is going to a really, really tough challenge for Castillo #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jordan R. Bass Ph.D.
timelineItems.text: I didn't think it was possible but these #USMNT kits look worse on the players than in promotional photos. Especially fully buttoned up.

timelineItems.name: Brad O'Neil
timelineItems.text: #USMNT v embattled Ukraine - is that what the Olympics felt like during the Cold War?

timelineItems.name: Bill Vegas
timelineItems.text: I would really like to see Altidore gave any change of pace when he passes the ball. #USAvUKR

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Did @TaylorTwellman just liken the crowd and atmosphere tonight in Cyprus to that at a New England Revolution home game? #USMNT

Second Half ends, Ukraine 2, USA 0.

timelineItems.name: John Sanger
timelineItems.text: Big opportunity for John Brooks to show some stuff today. #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Once de @ussoccer vs Ucrania | Howard; Cameron, Onyewu, Brooks, Castillo; Jones, Kljestan; Bedoya, Dempsey(c), Johnson; Altidore. #UKRvUSA

timelineItems.name: Terry Henry
timelineItems.text: Onyewu starting? This should be interesting! #USMNT #CmonYouYanks

timelineItems.name: Graham Ruthven
timelineItems.text: You'll see a couple of Stars & Stripes flags on your TV picture from Larnaca. Would go speak to them but they're on opposite side of stadium

timelineItems.name: ynwacy
timelineItems.text: #football #usa #ukraine #fifa #worldcup #brazil #2014 #usmnt #teamamerica #larnaca #stadium #cyprus #friendly

timelineItems.name: Hot Tomato
timelineItems.text: Dear Tim Howard, We want your beard back. Thank you, All the female fans of US soccer #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Justin Ferguson
timelineItems.text: It's time to America. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Keith Buderus
timelineItems.text: Ian Darke believes 4 players in starting XI are still fighting for spot. My guess- Sacha, Brooks, Gooch, Castillo. Other 7 are safe #usmnt
